text: "Policy of Truth" is a 1990 song by British band Depeche Mode and is the third single from their seventh studio album Violator. It went to number 16 in the United Kingdom, number 15 in the United States, number 11 in Ireland, number 14 in Canada, number 5 in Italy and Finland, number 12 in Switzerland and number 7 in Spain and Germany. ==Track listings== All songs were written by Martin L.
